SELECT b.id headerId, b.default_number defaultNumber, b.sub_type subType, CASE b.sub_type WHEN 1 THEN '采购入库' WHEN 2 THEN '销售退货' WHEN 3 THEN '零售退货' WHEN 4 THEN '其他入库' WHEN 5 THEN '销售出库' WHEN 6 THEN '采购退货' WHEN 7 THEN '调拨' WHEN 8 THEN '零售出库' WHEN 9 THEN '其他出库' WHEN 15 THEN '验收入库' ELSE '' END subTypeName, CONVERT(b.oper_time, CHAR) operTime, a.material_name materialName, a.material_model materialModel, a.oper_number operNumber, FORMAT(a.unit_price, 2) unitPrice, FORMAT(a.all_price, 2) allPrice, IF(IFNULL(c.supplier, '') = '', e.`name`, c.supplier) supplierName, d.`name` depotName, b.status, b.status_content statusContent, b.link_number linkNumber FROM erp_depotitem a LEFT JOIN erp_depot d ON a.depot_id = d.id, erp_depothead b LEFT JOIN erp_supplier c ON b.organ_id = c.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer e ON b.organ_id = e.id WHERE a.delete_flag = '0' AND a.header_id = b.id AND b.type = '2' AND b.sub_type != '10'
AND a.material_name LIKE '%${materialName}%'
AND a.depot_id = #{depotId}
AND IF(IFNULL(c.supplier, '') = '', e.`name`, c.supplier) LIKE '%${organName}%'
AND b.oper_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= b.oper_time
ORDER BY b.oper_time DESC

SELECT b.id headerId, b.default_number defaultNumber, b.sub_type subType, CASE b.sub_type WHEN 1 THEN '采购入库' WHEN 2 THEN '销售退货' WHEN 3 THEN '零售退货' WHEN 4 THEN '其他入库' WHEN 5 THEN '销售出库' WHEN 6 THEN '采购退货' WHEN 7 THEN '调拨' WHEN 8 THEN '零售出库' WHEN 9 THEN '其他出库' ELSE '' END subTypeName, CONVERT(b.oper_time, CHAR) operTime, a.material_name materialName, a.material_model materialModel, a.oper_number operNumber, FORMAT(a.unit_price, 2) unitPrice, FORMAT(a.all_price, 2) allPrice, IF(IFNULL(c.supplier, '') = '', e.`name`, c.supplier) supplierName, d.`name` depotName, b.status, b.status_content statusContent, b.link_number linkNumber FROM erp_depotitem a LEFT JOIN erp_depot d ON a.depot_id = d.id, erp_depothead b LEFT JOIN erp_supplier c ON b.organ_id = c.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer e ON b.organ_id = e.id WHERE a.delete_flag = '0' AND a.header_id = b.id AND b.type = '1' AND b.sub_type != '11'
AND a.material_name LIKE '%${materialName}%'
AND a.depot_id = #{depotId}
AND IF(IFNULL(c.supplier, '') = '', e.`name`, c.supplier) LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND b.oper_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= b.oper_time
ORDER BY b.oper_time DESC

SELECT b.id, b.`name` materialName, b.model, IFNULL(c.`name`, b.unit_name) unitName, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number), 0) currentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price), 0), 2) currentTockMoney, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0) returnCurrentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0), 2) returnCurrentTockMoney FROM erp_material_norms a LEFT JOIN erp_unit c ON a.unit_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT q.norms_id, p.total_price, q.oper_number, p.sub_type, p.type, q.m_type FROM erp_depothead p, erp_depotitem q WHERE q.header_id = p.id AND q.delete_flag = '0' AND p.delete_flag = '0' AND p.type = '2' AND p.sub_type != '10' AND DATE_FORMAT(p.oper_time, '%Y-%m') = #{operTime} ) m ON m.norms_id = a.id, erp_material b WHERE a.meterial_id = b.id
AND b.material_name LIKE '%${materialName}%'
AND a.delete_flag = '0' AND b.delete_flag = '0' GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY b.`name`

SELECT b.id, b.`name` materialName, b.model, IFNULL(c.`name`, b.unit_name) unitName, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number), 0) currentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price), 0), 2) currentTockMoney, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0) returnCurrentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0), 2) returnCurrentTockMoney FROM erp_material_norms a LEFT JOIN erp_unit c ON a.unit_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT q.norms_id, p.total_price, q.oper_number, p.sub_type, p.type, q.m_type FROM erp_depothead p, erp_depotitem q WHERE q.header_id = p.id AND q.delete_flag = '0' AND p.delete_flag = '0' AND p.type = '1' AND p.sub_type != '11' AND DATE_FORMAT(p.oper_time, '%Y-%m') = #{operTime} ) m ON m.norms_id = a.id, erp_material b WHERE a.meterial_id = b.id AND a.delete_flag = '0' AND b.delete_flag = '0' GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY b.`name`

SELECT b.id, b.`name` materialName, b.model, IFNULL(c.`name`, b.unit_name) unitName, k.`name` typeName, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 12 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) WHEN 13 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE CASE m.type WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END)), 0) currentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 12 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) WHEN 13 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE CASE m.type WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END)), 0), 2) currentTockMoney FROM erp_material_norms a LEFT JOIN erp_unit c ON a.unit_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT q.norms_id, p.total_price, q.oper_number, p.sub_type, p.type, q.m_type FROM erp_depothead p, erp_depotitem q WHERE q.header_id = p.id AND q.delete_flag = '0' AND p.delete_flag = '0' AND (p.type = '2' OR (p.type = '3' AND p.sub_type IN(12, 13))) AND p.sub_type != '10' AND DATE_FORMAT(p.oper_time, '%Y-%m') = #{operTime} ) m ON m.norms_id = a.id, erp_material b LEFT JOIN erp_material_category k ON b.category_id = k.id WHERE a.meterial_id = b.id
AND b.material_name LIKE '%${materialName}%'
AND a.delete_flag = '0' AND b.delete_flag = '0' GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY b.`name`

SELECT b.id, b.`name` materialName, b.model, IFNULL(c.`name`, b.unit_name) unitName, k.`name` typeName, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 12 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN 13 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ELSE CASE m.type WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END)), 0) currentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 12 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN 13 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ELSE CASE m.type WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END)), 0), 2) currentTockMoney FROM erp_material_norms a LEFT JOIN erp_unit c ON a.unit_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT q.norms_id, p.total_price, q.oper_number, p.sub_type, p.type, q.m_type FROM erp_depothead p, erp_depotitem q WHERE q.header_id = p.id AND q.delete_flag = '0' AND p.delete_flag = '0' AND (p.type = '1' OR (p.type = '3' AND p.sub_type IN(12, 13))) AND p.sub_type != '11' AND DATE_FORMAT(p.oper_time, '%Y-%m') = #{operTime} ) m ON m.norms_id = a.id, erp_material b LEFT JOIN erp_material_category k ON b.category_id = k.id WHERE a.meterial_id = b.id
AND b.material_name LIKE '%${materialName}%'
AND a.delete_flag = '0' AND b.delete_flag = '0' GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY b.`name`
